price: ߊ߬ ߣߴߌ ߦߴߌ ߕߟߏߡߊߟߐ߬ ߸ ߞߟߌߟߌߟߊ ߦߴߊ߬ ߞߊ߲ߠߊߓߐ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߟߏ߲ ߡߍ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߓߐ߫ ߦߌߟߊ߫ ߛߎߘߎ߲ ߘߏ߫ ߘߐ߫
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
